title: Pulled beef brisket in a milk bun
description: Tom Kerridge calls this beef version of pulled pork the ‘ultimate sandwich’. It may take a while, but it will be worth the wait. Serve with coleslaw.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a pestle and mortar, some kitchen string and a freestanding mixer with dough hook attachment.
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz cooking juices from the beef brisket (see above) or beef gravy
15g/½oz fresh yeast or 1 x 7g sachet of fast-action yeast
